participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, Emily is dedicated to her profession and values family time. She enjoys reading and finds joy in simple pleasures.
participant_1.background: i'm a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Resilient and determined, Jake is passionate about sports and values family connections. He is adapting to life's challenges with a positive outlook.
participant_2.background: i love playing softball. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business.
